GlossaryTerm.TermName: hereditary leiomyomatosis and renal cell cancer syndrome

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A rare inherited disorder that increases the risk of developing benign (not cancer) tumors of the skin and the uterus (leiomyomas) and malignant (cancer) tumors of the uterus (leiomyosarcoma) and the kidney. Also called HLRCC.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "hereditary leiomyomatosis and renal cell cancer syndrome"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "leiomiomatosis hereditaria y síndrome de cáncer de células renales"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: leiomiomatosis hereditaria y síndrome de cáncer de células renales

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Trastorno hereditario poco frecuente que aumenta el riesgo de padecer de tumores benignos (no cancerosos) de la piel y el útero (leiomiomas), y tumores malignos (cancerosos) del útero (leiomiosarcoma) y el riñón. También se llama HLRCC.
